name: Drop-in: Workout Class
description: Join the drop-in fitness class for an invigorating total body warm-up and workout experience that's both enjoyable and low-impact. They fuse dynamic elements of yoga and Pilates, emphasizing flexibility, balance, and core strength. Priorities include focused stretching, core strengthening, and body lengthening exercises. Held outdoors in the scenic Garfield Center courtyard and soccer field, we've got you covered in inclement weather with our indoor recreation room. Hand weights (2, 3, and 5 pou
